meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7224.

td.p: Mara Apostol, a criminal defense attorney from Miami, Florida
Phyllis Kidd, a retired teacher from Glen Ellyn, Illinois
Fred Vaughn, an Internet operations technician from Mineral Point, Wisconsin (whose 4-day cash winnings total $65,700)

tr.td: COIF MEDICINE
PRESIDENTIAL SURNAMES ON FILM
"O" IN LITERATURE
MATH TERMS
5-LETTER VERBS
(Jimmy: From the Great Fire to the great buildings, we learn about it from the Chicago History Museum.)

MURPHY!
AS I LIVE & BREATHE
YOU OLD SON OF A GUN MAKER

NO C
(Alex: And in that last category, each correct response will be one word of a pair. But it'll be the word that is--does not begin with the letter "C", okay? Common pairs.)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
